name: Turgen System
short_description:
Turgen System is intended to be used by owners of Atari 8-bit computers who use data recorders.

Turgen System converts files to various turbo systems and also to standard tape records.

Turgen System has special support for conversion of segmented binary files which includes a wizard and a set of binary loaders.

Output of the program is a WAVE file, an electric signal on the output of the sound card, or a tape image.

Auxiliary functionality
Reading of tape images 
Turbo decoder that retrieves data from tapes
Tool for embedding BASIC files into binary files
Tool for merging segments of binary files
Data transfer via serial port using with CAS COM utility and SIO2PC or ATART hardware
Tape image extractor tool that extracts data from tape images

Turbo systems supported
Czech
Turbo 2000, Turbo 2000 - kilobyte blocks, Super Turbo, B-TAPE, TURBO TAPE

Polish
KSO Turbo 2000, Atari Super Turbo (AST, BUT), Turbo ROM, Turbo Blizzard, Hard Turbo, Lower Silesia Turbo 2000
summary: Transfer programs from PC to 8-bit Atari using just a data recorder
